== About Me ==

My name is Greg Grossmeier and I was the Founder/Team Lead for the Michigan LoCo Team from 2007-2011.  See their wiki page at MichiganTeam. I left that position when I moved to the great city of San Francisco, CA where I am now a member of the California LoCo.

See my homepage at <nowiki>[[http://grossmeier.net|grossmeier.net]]</nowiki> and my blog at <nowiki>[[http://blog.grossmeier.net|blog.grossmeier.net]]</nowiki>
